channel.title: [solved]
channel.description: OK, um I just got the easyRSC source thing and i got the server and the client running but i cant log in: it says "The client has been updated. Please download the newest one." Can someone tell me which client I need? I HAVE tried the search button and google and not found anything. So tell me whats going on please. Thank you- :) Ghostly150

item.title: [solved]
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Ok how do i tell that?

EDIT:

Shouldn’t they be the same version, I downloaded the easyRSC thing and it came with the server and the client in one archive.

EDIT:

Where can I get an updated client?

EDIT:

FIXED! I am so smart! (with a little help to point me in the right direction of course) lol

Read full topic

item.title: [solved]
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Make sure mudclient and server have the same client version.

Read full topic
